channel.title: Equipment Interface Issue [317]
channel.description:
I have this issue with my equipment interface; When I open it up, it always shows the same character image, even if I have equipment on or if the default look is different.
[IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq256/xxx9234/equipmentinterface.png[/img]
Can someone help please?
